Package com.snakk.adview

This is the legacy Snakk Advertising SDK. New integrations should use com.snakk.advertising

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AdPrompt.AdPromptCallbackListener Callbacks for AdPrompts.
 

Class Summary
AdInterstitialView Viewer of interstitial advertising.
AdPrompt  
AdView Viewer of advertising.
 

Enum Summary
AdView.BannerAdSize Available ad dimensions for display AUTOSIZE_BANNER will attempt to fill the size allocated to the AdView See http://snakkads.com/technology/ad-specs for a description of the other ad sizes
 

Package com.snakk.adview Description

This is the legacy Snakk Advertising SDK. New integrations should use com.snakk.advertising
